Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Belmont House is located in the heart of Kimpton Industrial Park in West Sutton. The property is located on Kimpton Road which is accessed from the A217 arterial road providing direct access to central London to the north and the M25 (J8) to the south. Sutton Common Train Station is located 0.8 miles away, offering good public transport links into central London and beyond. The A217 also benefits from numerous bus routes.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 9 Kimpton Road Industrial Estate, Sutton, SM3 9TE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The unit is strategically located in a prominent position on the A23 Purley Way, one
of Croydonâ€™s most established and sought after industrial and retail areas. 214
Purley Way is located 10 miles south of Central London and 6 miles north of J7 of
the M25/M23 motorways.




West Croydon Station is 1.3 miles away and Waddon Marsh Tram Stop is 0.3 miles
away, providing regular services to East Croydon and Wimbledon. Purley Way also
benefits from numerous bus routes.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unit 5, 214 Purley Way, Croydon, CR0 4XD

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Prologis Park Beddington will deliver 6 new industrial and logistics units, offering flexible opportunities from 13,820 - 146,120 sq ft.

All units will be ready for occupation in Q2 2021 with the opportunity of early access for fit-out to get you up and running without delay. 

For maximum flexibility, DC2 can be leased as three individual units or as two or three units combined.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Thornton Road Industrial Estate is located just off Thornton Road (A23) in Croydon, a well-established industrial location. The estate is located immediately North of the Purley Way. The A23 links Central London (8 miles) with the M25 Junction 7 (10 miles) providing access to the national motorway network. Ampere Way Tram Station is approximately 10 minutes from the site, providing access to London Overground services at East Croydon Station (10 minutes), Mitcham Junction (8 minutes) and Wimbledon (20 minutes).

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unit 6 Thornton Road Industrial Estate, Thornton Road, Croydon, CR0 3BT

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The scheme is located on Bell Green Retail Park, Sydenham, London and benefits from excellent transport communications with the London South Circular Road A205 and the A20, providing links across the whole of London and the wider UK motorway network, including the M20 & M25.


Lower Sydenham Station is 0.7 mile and Sydenham Station is 1.3 miles away. These stations provide fast and regular services into Central London. Bell Green Retail Park also benefits from numerous bus routes.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unit B8, Bell Green Retail Park, Sydenham, SE6 4RS

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Unit 1 is located on City Cross Business Park, Greenwich and benefits from immediate proximity to Canary Wharf and the City of London.Â The Blackwall Tunnell Southern Approach (A102) road is located 0.2 miles from the property, providing direct access into the City to the north, and the M25 motorway to the south via the A2 road. North Greenwich underground station is located 0.8 miles north of the property, whilst Westcombe Park Station is located 1.0 miles south. Both operate regular services into Central London.Â 

The property is to be refurbished and has ancillary office accommodation, a separate staff entrance and staff facilities.

ACCOMMODATION BREAKDOWN

Ground Floor Warehouse: 5,610 sq ft (521 sq m)

Ground Floor Offices: 492 sq ft (46 sq m)

First Floor Offices: 834 sq ft (77 sq m)

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unit To Let With Immediate Proximity to Central London

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Axion, Belvedere - South East London's newest industrial / warehouse development

Introducing a new, high quality HQ warehouse, strategically located in one of South East Londonâ€™s most established industrial locations.

This Grade A, 68,360 sq ft unit is in a prominent position on the corner of Picardy Manorway and Bronze Age Way, with easy access to the M25, Central London and Docklands, and in close proximity to over 8 million of the UKâ€™s population.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: MAIN AXION PHOTO - FRONT OF OFFICES

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The building is situated on its own self-contained
secure site and is constructed from steel portal
frame design, incorporating 10m minimum eaves, 2
electrically operated loading doors, with separate
pedestrian access to the reception area and high
quality air conditioned first floor offices. The offices benefit from suspended ceilings,
recessed LED lights, carpeted full access raised
floor, double glazed windows and VRF heat pump
heating and cooling system.

Prime Distribution Warehouse close to Central London
Up to 16.5m eaves
103 loading doors on all four elevations
Secure site with gatehouse
175 car parking spaces
Office accommodation with canteen

Westpoint Trading Estate is located on Alliance Road which is
accessed via Western Road (A40), within an established
industrial area in Acton, West London. The A40 provides
excellent access to Central London (8 miles), the M4 (4 miles),
the M40 (10 miles), the M1 (5 miles), the M25 (11.5 miles) and
the wider national motorway network.

Mitre Bridge Industrial Estate is located north of the White City junction on the A40 and is accessed directly from the A219 (Scrubs Lane). The A219 links with the A40 Western Avenue providing excellent access into Central London and the national motorway networks (M1, M4, M40 and M25). 

Ladbroke Grove Underground Station (Hammersmith & City Line) is 1.2 miles away offering good public transport links into Central London and beyond.

The Frogmore Industrial Estate is situated in the heart of Park Royal fronting on Acton Road offering excellent access to central London, the A40/M40 and M25.

Units 3-6 comprise a terrace of 4 warehouse units which are being marketed as one single unit of 47,612 sq ft. The unit has been comprehensively refurbished and benefits from a large secure yard.

The unit benefits from minimum eaves of 4.5 rising to 5.8m, with 4 level loading doors and fitted offices at ground and first floor level.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Units 3-6 Frogmore Industrial Estate, Park Royal

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The Frogmore Industrial Estate is situated in the heart of Park Royal fronting onto Acton Lane offering excellent access to central London, the A40/M40 and M25.Â 

Unit 1 has been comprehensively refurbished and benefits from a large secure yard. 

ACCOMMODATIONÂ 

Warehouse: 20,985 sq ft

Ground Floor Offices: 2,044 sq ft

TOTAL: 25,085 sq ft

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unit 1 Frogmore Industrial Estate, Park Royal

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Townsend Industrial Estate sits in the heart of Park Royal.Â  Waxlow Road is located off Acton Lane and within walking distance of North Acton Underground and Harlesden Underground/Overground.Â 

The A40 and North Circular are both within 2 miles, providing excellent road access to Central London as well as the M40 and M1 motorways. 

The property comprises of 2 modern industrial terrace warehouses, benefitting from a steel portal frame with part brick/part clad elevations.Â  The property also benefits from two floors of office accommodation, a generous yard and car parking to the front.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: TOWNSEND IND ESTAT CGI IMAGE JULY 2019

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Fully Refurbished Industrial Units In The Heart of Park Royal

Each occupier will benefit from best-in-class design, purpose-built for efficiency providing a comfortable working environment, with high-speed broadband connectivity and leading energy-saving technologies. Your new hubâ€™s location is second to none, with exceptional transport links to central London, the UK and overseas.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The property is located on the established East Lane Business Park in Wembley, immediately north of North Wembley station (Bakerloo and Overground Lines). Access to the Property is from East Lane (A408), which provides easy access to the national motorway network, via the A40 at Hanger Lane and Junction 1 of the M1.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: DC1 Victory Park, East Lane, Wembley,

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property comprises a modern, high quality portal frame warehouse production and office unit on a well-established and secure estate.

Located just off the south bound carriage way of the A10 and with close proximity to the A1010 and Southbury train station, the unit offers excellent access to Central London.
